info.title: Midia API
info.description: API for managing midia, categories, genres, users, sessions, and comments.

get.description: Retrieve the details of a specific Completion by its ID.
Retrieve the details of a specific Category by its ID.

parameters.name: midias
parameters.description: Include Midia related to the Category.

parameters.name: genres
parameters.description: Include Genres related to the Category.

get.description: Retrieve the details of a specific Genre by its ID.

parameters.name: midias
parameters.description: Include Midia related to the Genre.

parameters.name: status_in
parameters.description: filter by more than one status

parameters.name: status_notin
parameters.description: filter by status different from value

parameters.name: id_not_in
parameters.description: filter by id different from value

post.description: Creates a new User with the provided details.

get.description: Retrieve the details of a specific User by their ID.

parameters.name: midias
parameters.description: Include Midia related to the User.

parameters.name: sessions
parameters.description: Include Sessions related to the User.

parameters.name: comments
parameters.description: Include Comments made by the User.

delete.description: Deletes a specific User by their ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the User to be deleted.

post.description: Creates a new Midia with the provided details.

id_category.description: Id from Category of the Midia.

id_main_midia.description: Id from Main Midia for a sub-midia.

release.format: yyyy | mm | dd | dd/mm/yyyy| mm/yyyy | dd/mm

get.description: Retrieve the details of a specific Midia by its ID.

parameters.name: genres
parameters.description: Include Genres related to the Midia.

parameters.name: users
parameters.description: Include Users related to the Midia.

parameters.name: comments
parameters.description: Include Comments related to the Midia.

release.format: yyyy | mm | dd | dd/mm/yyyy| mm/yyyy | dd/mm
yyyy | mm | dd | dd/mm/yyyy| mm/yyyy | dd/mm

delete.description: Deletes a specific Midia by their ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the Midia to be deleted.

post.summary: Add a new Genre to a Midia
post.description: Adds a new Genre to a Midia by their IDs with the provided details.

parameters.name: id_midia
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the Midia to be deleted.

main.description: Indicates if is the main Genre of the Midia.

release.format: yyyy | mm | dd | dd/mm/yyyy| mm/yyyy | dd/mm

put.description: Update Genre from Midia by their IDs.

parameters.name: id_midia
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the Midia to be updated.

parameters.name: id_genre
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the Genre to be updated.

main.description: Indicates if is the main Genre of the Midia.

release.format: yyyy | mm | dd | dd/mm/yyyy| mm/yyyy | dd/mm

417.description: Error occurred during Genre from Midia update.

delete.description: Removes a specific Genre from Midia by their IDs.

parameters.name: id_midia
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the Midia to be deleted.

parameters.name: id_genre
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the Genre to be deleted.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: filter by start or end iquals to value

parameters.name: range_start
parameters.description: filter by start or end greater or iquals to value(requires range_end)

parameters.name: range_end
parameters.description: filter by start or end lower or iquals to value(requires range_start)

post.description: Creates a new Session with the provided details.

id_user.description: Id from User of the Session.

id_midia.description: Id from Midia of the Session.

start.description: Start timespamp of the Session.(current timestamp when null)

get.description: Retrieve the details of a specific Session by its ID.

delete.description: Deletes a specific Session by their ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the Session to be deleted.

get.description: Returns a list of User Midia relations.

parameters.name: score_lower
parameters.description: filter by score lower than value

parameters.name: score_higher
parameters.description: filter by score higher than value

post.description: Add a new Midia to User Session with the provided details.

id_completion.description: Id from Completion of the Midia from User.

score.description: Score of the Midia from User.

get.description: Retrieve the details of a specific User Midia relationship by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the User Midia.

put.description: Update User Midia by their ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the User Midia.

id_completion.description: Id from Completion of the Midia from User.

score.description: Score of the Midia from User.

417.description: Error occurred during User Midia update.

delete.description: Deletes a specific User Midia by their ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the User Midia to be deleted.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: filter by created or updated iquals to value

parameters.name: range_start
parameters.description: filter by created or updated greater or iquals to value(requires range_end)

parameters.name: range_end
parameters.description: filter by start or end lower or iquals to value(requires range_start)

post.description: Creates a new Comment with the provided details.

id_user.description: Id from User of the Comment.

id_midia.description: Id from Midia of the Comment.

id_session.description: Id from Session of the Comment.

get.description: Retrieve the details of a specific Comment by its ID.

delete.description: Deletes a specific Comment by their ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the Comment to be deleted.

post.description: Login providing Users's name and password.

put.description: Changes Users password providing old password.

old_password.description: Current Password from User.(not required when User has no Password)

417.description: Error occurred during User's Password update.
